original_prompt: In this task, you are given two phrases: Head and Tail, separated with <sep>. The Head and the Tail events are short phrases possibly involving participants. The names of specific people have been replaced by generic words (e.g., PersonX, PersonY, PersonZ). PersonX is always the subject of the event. You have to determine whether the Head happens before the Tail or not. Classify your answers into "Yes" and "No". The phrase may also contain "___", a placeholder that can be an object, a person, and/or an action.
generated_prompts: You will receive two phrases, Head and Tail, separated with <sep>. The phrases may include people, actions, and objects. PersonX is always the subject of the event. Your task is to determine if the Head event occurs before the Tail event. Answer by classifying your response into "Yes" or "No". The phrases may contain a placeholder, "___", which can stand for any object, person, or action.
